summary: Frontend testing completed for USD pricing fix and Live FX Rate visibility. All 8 features tested successfully. Subscription pricing now shows USD (Free, $10/mo, $50/mo, Custom) instead of PHP. Live FX Rate component visible in all 3 required locations (Landing hero, Pricing page, App Home) with 30s auto-refresh and live indicator.

landing_hero_live_fx_ticker.details: Live FX Ticker shows 'Live rate: 1 USD = ₱XX.XX • Updates every 30s' with green dot indicator in landing hero section.

landing_pricing_preview_usd.details: Pricing preview shows 'Subscription Plans (USD)' badge. Plans: Basic (Free), Premium ($10/mo), SME ($50/mo), Enterprise (Custom). No PHP subscription pricing found.

pricing_page_usd_pricing.details: Pricing page shows USD pricing: Basic (Free), Premium ($10/mo USD), SME ($50/mo USD), Enterprise (Custom). 'USD' label visible on price cards.

pricing_page_live_fx_rate.details: Live FX Rate card displayed below header with 'Live Rate' badge, '1 USD = ₱XX.XX', '15-min rate lock' badge, and 'No fees' text.

pricing_comparison_table_usd.details: Feature Comparison table shows 'Monthly Fee (USD)' header with values: Free, $10/mo, $50/mo, Custom.

app_home_live_fx_rate.details: App Home shows Live FX Rate as primary card with: 'Live Rate' badge, green dot indicator, '1 USD = ₱XX.XX', '15-min rate lock' badge, 'No fees', and disclaimer text.

fx_rate_live_indicator.details: Green dot indicator present when rate is stable. Pulse animation expected when updating (30s interval).

send_money_php_for_transfers.details: Send Money flow correctly uses USD for 'You send' and PHP for 'They receive'. FX rate displayed as '1 USD = ₱XX.XX'.

critical_code_review_comments: LiveFXRate component is well-structured with reusable props (showLockInfo, showDisclaimer, compact, variant)
FX rates are MOCKED using getFluctuatedRate() with micro-fluctuations around BASE_RATE (56.25)
Auto-refresh interval is 30 seconds as specified
USD pricing correctly implemented: Free, $10/mo, $50/mo, Custom
PHP is only used for transfer amounts in Send Money flow, not for subscription pricing
test_credentials: No credentials needed - all flows are mocked. Any email and 6-digit OTP works.
context_for_next_testing_agent: USD pricing fix verified: Subscriptions now show USD (Free, $10/mo, $50/mo, Custom) instead of PHP. Live FX Rate component visible in 3 locations: Landing hero (LiveFXTicker), Pricing page (LiveFXRate card), App Home (LiveFXRate as primary card). FX rate auto-refreshes every 30 seconds with green dot indicator. PHP is only used for transfer amounts in Send Money flow.
